title: Corroded grooves
brief_description: This interactive installation consists of two re-designed turntables, a computer, a monitor, audio speakers and a mixing console. The computer plays a variety of samples taken from the turntables which have been digitally manipulated and recomposed to create minimal rythums, melodies and bass tones.
